title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
OB: When searching for declarations using the search feature in the Package view selection and dialog, no results are shown.
EB: When searching for declarations using the search feature in the Package view selection and dialog, the expected results should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Right-click on any package and select 'Search' from the context menu.
3. In the search dialog, enter a search term and click the 'Search' button.
4. Note that no search results are displayed.
